title: The Night (With Hvdson)
lyrics:
Lyric DOF - The Night (With Hvdson)

[Romanization]

It's the same damn night
I'll wait for you
But baby I don't know
Two things I have to try

I didn't know why
I didn't know why
First time feel the burn
Like fire

I didn't know why
You didn't know why

You're burnin'
You just wanna cave in, cave in
Don't know but I still recognize

Say my name
Baby I don't care if you think
If it's right or, right or wrong

Say my name
You know I don't care
If it's right or, right or
Right or wrong

Just say my name
I can get your freedom
And your voice still echoes
In the corner of my mind

Yeah, baby don't you recognize
The night

It's the same thing
I can't say for you
Can't give you everything
Same fate we intertwine

I didn't know why
I didn't know why
First time feel the burn
Like fire

I didn't know why
You didn't know why

You're burnin'

Don't know but I still recognize

Say my name
Baby I don't care if you think
If it's right or, right or wrong

Say my name
You know I don't care
If it's right or, right or
Right or wrong

Just say my name
I can get your freedom
And your voice still echoes
In the corner of my mind

Yeah, baby don't you recognize
The night

Round, round
Lookin' at you baby
Your laughter

Won't this fire
Make you relive your mistakes

Cause you know I'm a rockstar
Rolling stone
You know I'm a rockstar
It can't be right

So don't you walk, walk, walk
Turn around out the door
You know that I just need you
right here, to

Say my name
Baby I don't care if you think
If it's right or, right or wrong

Say my name
You know I don't care
If it's right or, right or
Right or wrong

Just say my name
I can get your freedom
And your voice still echoes
In the corner of my mind

Yeah, baby don't you recognize
The night
